member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Tracing.Tracer
member.summary: Represents a performance tracing class to log method entry/exit and duration.

remarks.para: Lifetime of the Tracer object will determine the beginning and the end of the trace. The trace message will include, method being traced, start time, end time and duration.
Since Tracer uses the logging block to log the trace message, you can include application data as part of your trace message. Configured items from call context will be logged as part of the message.
Trace message will be logged to the "Trace" category. You must configure the "Trace" category with desire log sinks to log the trace messages.
